entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 a.m. CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
